Attributes.description: Energy infrastructure; pipe flows; equipment and facilities including compressors, pumping stations, coolers, and controls; terminals; pipeline integrity; corrosion control.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) MECH 221 or (b) APSC 278 and one of CIVL 215, MTRL 263 and one of CIVL 230, MECH 260.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 10:00, End Time: 11:30, Building: Orchard, Room: Commons
